item.title: Cereal Logger
item.description: I recently came across this challenge on twitter. Write to /dev/null using a special cookie to read a flag! That intrigued me enough to sign up on 247ctf.com and take a crack at it myself. This is what the challenge looks like once you start playing. The code starts with an insert_log class which does some really questionable things but letâ€™s come back to that later. The if statements are where the fun begins.
